Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes

Class DynamicScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.StaticScene
      • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.DynamicScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clearable, Configurable, Destroyable, nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.events.userinput.KeyListener, Initializable, RequiresInjection, DimensionsProvider, WithSupplier, YaegerScene, Updatable, UpdateDelegator, WithTimerList
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SplashScene
    public abstract class DynamicScene
extends StaticScene
implements UpdateDelegator, WithTimerList
    Instantiate a new DynamicScene. A DynamicScene extends a StaticScene, but adds its own Gameloop.
